amendment.description: To repeal the job-killing health care law and health care-related provisions in the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.

action.text: Amendment SA 13 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 13 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 9.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 13.

Amendment SA 13 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S382-405; text: CR S382) To repeal the job-killing health care law and health care-related provisions in the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 13 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 9.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 13 proposed by Senator McConnell.
